arts.ttl: Joseph Paintsil’s first-half hat trick leads Galaxy over Sporting KC 4-1
arts.sum: Diego Fagúndez used assists from Paintsil — his fifth — and Gabriel Pec to score his fifth goal and cap the scoring for the Galaxy (5-17-9) in the 60th minute. Joseph Paintsil had a hat trick by halftime and the Los Angeles Galaxy cruised to a 4-1 victory over Sporting Kansas City on Saturday night.
